feed.title: Planka Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Planka: planka-0.2.16
entry.content: A Helm chart to deploy Planka and it's dependencies.

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.24.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Consider language specifics when parsing time
  • fix: Prevent list with multiline title from overflowing board view
  • fix: Disable pointer events when dragging

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.24.0...v1.24.1

entry.title: New release for Planka: planka-0.2.17
entry.content: A Helm chart to deploy Planka and it's dependencies.

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.24.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add Serbian translation (#952)
  • fix: Lazy initialize OIDC client (#947)
  • fix: Fix path to apple-touch-icon (#948)
  • fix: Disable text selection when drag-scrolling

New Contributors

  • @darktohka made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/947
  • @knif3 made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/948
  • @PolarniMeda made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/952

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.24.1...v1.24.2
